ComicInfo.Summary:
Dark magic and evil rituals are two things Robyn’s life knows almost too well and this day won’t be any different. Something deadly is coming for our favorite vigilante-archer, and Robyn is going to be in a fight for her soul when she takes on the mysterious Voodoo Dawn!
32-pages of kickass-action packed all in one book!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Ian MacDonald | 3 | D | 2021 June Movie Club Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Sun Khamunaki | Missing | E | 2021 June Movie Club Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Sun Khamunaki | Missing | F | 2021 World Tour Australia Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | Missing | G | 2021 July Livestream Coyote Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover 2 of 2, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
